message.content: nrnみたいにashibanix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>みたいにしてほしい

content.thinking:
The user wants to create a flake template system similar to `nrn` (probably referring to some template initialization tool), where they can run something like:

```
ashibanix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>
```

Wait, let me re-read. They want to use `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>` - this is standard Nix flake templates functionality.

Looking at the recent commits:
- `57da83d refactor: move templates to ashiba repository`

So it seems like templates were recently moved to the ashiba repository. 

The templates were originally added to dotnix but then migrated to ashiba, so I need to figure out whether the user wants me to work on setting up the templates in the ashiba repo itself or if they need something in dotnix that points to the ashiba templates.

Looking at what they're asking for—they want to use `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>` similar to how `nrn` works—this is just standard Nix flake template functionality. Since we're currently in the dotnix repo, I should explore what's here and check if there's a reference to ashiba or if they want me to create a CLI command that wraps this flake init call.

content.text: まず現状を確認します。

content.content:
1→# dotnix
     2→
     3→[![DeepWiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/DeepWiki-yutakobayashidev%2Fdotnix-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,REDACTED)](https://deepwiki.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix)
     4→
     5→## Target
     6→
     7→| Machine | Name | OS | System | Stable |
     8→|---|---|---|---|---|
     9→| UM790 Pro | UM790-Pro | NixOS | x86_64-linux | ◎ |
    10→| Still Legend x870 | Still-Legend-x870 | NixOS (WSL) | x86_64-linux | △ |
    11→| M2 MacBook Air | M2-MacBook-Air | macOS | aarch64-darwin | ◎ |
    12→| Galaxy S23 FE | Galaxy-S23FE | Android (nix-on-droid) | aarch64-linux | △ |
    13→
    14→
    15→## Module Structure
    16→
    17→```
    18→flake.nix                    # Entry point (nixos + darwin + nixOnDroid Configurations)
    19→├── nix/
    20→│   ├── hosts/
    21→│   │   ├── UM790-Pro/           # NixOS host config (boot, network, locale)
    22→│   │   ├── Still-Legend-x870/   # NixOS-WSL host config (WSL, locale)
    23→│   │   ├── M2-MacBook-Air/      # macOS host config
    24→│   │   └── Galaxy-S23FE/        # nix-on-droid host config
    25→│   ├── profiles/
    26→│   │   ├── cli-minimal.nix  # Minimal CLI environment
    27→│   │   ├── cli.nix          # CLI environment (docker, tailscale)
    28→│   │   ├── cli-server.nix   # Server CLI environment (docker, no tailscale)
    29→│   │   ├── gui.nix          # GUI environment (niri, audio, bluetooth)
    30→│   │   ├── laptop.nix       # Laptop environment (gui + extras)
    31→│   │   └── darwin.nix       # macOS environment
    32→│   ├── modules/
    33→│   │   ├── linux/           # NixOS system modules (niri, docker, audio, etc.)
    34→│   │   ├── darwin/          # macOS nix-darwin modules (homebrew, system defaults, nix)
    35→│   │   ├── nix-on-droid/    # nix-on-droid shared modules
    36→│   │   └── home/            # Home Manager shared modules (zsh, git, claude-code)
    37→│   └── overlays/            # Custom packages (overlay)
    38→├── agents/skills/           # Claude Code agent skills
    39→├── nvim/                    # Neovim config (Lua)
    40→└── zsh/                     # Zsh config
    41→```
    42→
    43→## Documentation
    44→
    45→- [docs/UM790Pro.md](docs/UM790Pro.md) - NixOS installation guide
    46→- [docs/Still-Legend-x870.md](docs/Still-Legend-x870.md) - NixOS-WSL installation guide
    47→- [docs/M2-MacBook-Air.md](docs/M2-MacBook-Air.md) - nix-darwin installation guide for macOS
    48→- [docs/Galaxy-S23FE.md](docs/Galaxy-S23FE.md) - nix-on-droid installation guide for Android
    49→
    50→## Daily Usage
    51→
    52→```sh
    53→# Apply changes (NixOS or macOS)
    54→nix run .#switch
    55→
    56→# Build without applying
    57→nix run .#build
    58→
    59→# Format all files (nix, lua, sh)
    60→nix run .#fmt
    61→
    62→# Update flake inputs
    63→nix flake update
    64→```
    65→
    66→## Available Nix Apps
    67→
    68→### NixOS
    69→
    70→- `nix run .#switch` - Build and apply NixOS + Home Manager configuration (`sudo nixos-rebuild switch`)
    71→- `nix run .#build` - Build configuration without applying
    72→- `nix run .#fmt` - Format all files (nix, lua, sh) via [treefmt](https://github.com/numtide/treefmt-nix)
    73→
    74→### macOS
    75→
    76→- `nix run .#switch` - Build and apply nix-darwin + Home Manager configuration (`darwin-rebuild switch`)
    77→- `nix run .#build` - Build configuration without applying
    78→- `nix run .#fmt` - Format all files (nix, lua, sh) via [treefmt](https://github.com/numtide/treefmt-nix)
    79→
    80→Both use [nix-output-monitor](https://github.com/maralorn/nix-output-monitor) for build output.
    81→
    82→## Key Features
    83→
    84→### NixOS
    85→
    86→- **WM**: [Niri](https://github.com/YaLTeR/niri) (scrollable tiling Wayland compositor)
    87→- **IME**: fcitx5 + [hazkey](https://github.com/aster-void/nix-hazkey) (LLM-powered Japanese input)
    88→- **YubiKey**: PAM U2F authentication (polkit, swaylock)
    89→- **Development**: Docker, Tailscale, Android development environment
    90→
    91→### macOS
    92→
    93→- **Homebrew**: GUI app management via casks (Ghostty, Chrome, OrbStack, etc.)
    94→- **brew-nix**: Homebrew cask packages managed as Nix packages (version pinning & rollback)
    95→- **Touch ID**: sudo authentication support
    96→- **1Password**: Shell Plugins (gh, awscli2)
    97→
    98→## Managed Tools
    99→
   100→- **AI Development**: claude-code, codex, opencode, ccusage, vibe-kanban
   101→- **Version Control**: git, lazygit, jujutsu (jj), git-lfs, git-wt
   102→- **Core CLI**: ripgrep, fzf, jq, zoxide, lsd, btop, yazi, tmux
   103→- **Communication**: halloy (IRC)
   104→- **Editors**: Neovim, VSCode
   105→- **Terminal**: Ghostty, Zsh + Oh My Zsh
   106→- **Development**: Node.js, Bun, MoonBit, Google Cloud SDK, Typst
   107→- **Network**: nmap, bandwhich, speedtest-cli
   108→
   109→## Agent Skills
   110→
   111→Claude Code skills are managed via [agent-skills-nix](https://github.com/Kyure-A/agent-skills-nix).
   112→
   113→- **Config**: `nix/modules/home/agent-skills.nix`
   114→- **Local skills**: `agents/skills/`
   115→- **External skills**: [anthropics/skills](https://github.com/anthropics/skills), [vercel-labs/skills](https://github.com/vercel-labs/skills), [ast-grep/claude-skill](https://github.com/ast-grep/claude-skill)
   116→- **Deploy targets**: `~/.agents/skills`, `~/.config/claude/skills`, `~/.config/codex/skills`
   117→
   118→Key skills: `social-digest`, `oura-daily-watch`, `gha-lint`, `check-similarity`, `dce` (local), `docx`, `pdf`, `pptx`, `xlsx`, `frontend-design`, `webapp-testing`, `skill-creator` (Anthropic), `find-skills` (Vercel), `ast-grep` (ast-grep), `ui-ux-pro-max` (community)
   119→
   120→## Templates
   121→
   122→Project templates are managed in [ashiba](https://github.com/yutakobayashidev/ashiba). See the repository for available templates.
   123→
   124→

content.content:
1→#!/usr/bin/env zsh
     2→
     3→# ========================================
     4→# Aliases
     5→# ========================================
     6→
     7→# rebuild - unified via flake apps
     8→alias rebuild="nix run ~/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix#switch && source ~/.zshrc"
     9→
    10→# Platform-specific aliases
    11→if [[ "$(uname)" == "Darwin" ]]; then
    12→  alias cpd="pwd | pbcopy"
    13→else
    14→  alias cpd="pwd | wl-copy"
    15→fi
    16→
    17→# AI tools
    18→alias cl="claude"
    19→alias cld="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions"
    20→alias cldc="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --continue"
    21→alias clh="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model haiku"
    22→alias clo="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model opus"
    23→alias cls="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model sonnet"
    24→alias oc="opencode"
    25→alias cx="codex"
    26→alias ca="cursor-agent"
    27→
    28→# Docker
    29→alias do="docker container"
    30→alias dop="docker container ps"
    31→alias dob="docker container build"
    32→alias dor="docker container run --rm"
    33→alias dox="docker container exec -it"
    34→
    35→# Docker Compose
    36→alias dc="docker compose"
    37→alias dcu="docker compose up"
    38→alias dcub="docker compose up --build"
    39→alias dcd="docker compose down"
    40→alias dcr="docker compose restart"
    41→
    42→# Nix
    43→alias ns="nix-shell"
    44→alias ngc="nix-collect-garbage"
    45→nrn() { nix run "nixpkgs#$1" "${@:2}"; }
    46→
    47→alias p="pnpm"
    48→alias ls="lsd -1A"
    49→alias ll="lsd -l"
    50→alias la="lsd -la"
    51→alias lt="lsd --tree"
    52→alias cat="bat"
    53→alias gg="ghq get"
    54→alias prw="gh pr view --web"
    55→alias gundo="git reset --soft HEAD~1"
    56→alias rmswap="find . -type f -name \"*.swp\" -delete && find . -type f -name \".*.swp\" -delete"
    57→

content.content:
1→# ashiba
     2→
     3→Project templates collection. Dependencies are automatically updated.
     4→
     5→## Usage
     6→
     7→```bash
     8→nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>
     9→```
    10→
    11→## Templates
    12→
    13→| Name | Description |
    14→|---|---|
    15→| `flake-devenv` | Nix flake with devenv, treefmt, and git-hooks |
    16→| `next` | Next.js with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui |
    17→| `next-firebase-auth-e2e` | Next.js App Router with Firebase Auth and E2E testing |
    18→| `web-app` | [Web app template by hiroppy](https://github.com/hiroppy/web-app-template) |
    19→
    20→For language-specific flake templates, see also [the-nix-way/dev-templates](https://github.com/the-nix-way/dev-templates).
    21→

content.content:
1→# Agent Skills
     2→
     3→このディレクトリはClaude Codeで使用するスキルを管理します。
     4→
     5→## スキル管理
     6→
     7→スキルは`agent-skills-nix`フレームワークで管理されています。
     8→
     9→- **設定**: `nix/modules/home/agent-skills.nix`
    10→- **ローカルスキル**: `agents/skills/`
    11→- **デプロイ先**:
    12→  - `~/.agents/skills`
    13→  - `~/.config/claude/skills`
    14→
    15→## スキルの追加
    16→
    17→1. `agents/skills/<skill-name>/`ディレクトリを作成
    18→2. `SKILL.md`ファイルを作成
    19→3. `nh os switch`で反映
    20→
    21→## 利用可能なスキル
    22→
    23→### ローカルスキル
    24→
    25→- `social-digest` - Discord + Mastodon投稿をObsidianに保存
    26→- `oura-daily-watch` - Oura Ring データ + Discord行動分析
    27→
    28→### Anthropic公式スキル
    29→
    30→#### ドキュメントスキル
    31→- `docx` - Word文書作成・編集
    32→- `pdf` - PDF作成・抽出
    33→- `pptx` - PowerPoint作成・編集
    34→- `xlsx` - Excel処理
    35→
    36→#### サンプルスキル
    37→- `frontend-design` - フロントエンドデザイン
    38→- `skill-creator` - スキル作成ガイド
    39→- `webapp-testing` - Webアプリテスト（Playwright）
    40→
    41→その他のAnthropicスキルは`nix/modules/home/agent-skills.nix`で追加可能です。
    42→利用可能なスキル一覧: https://github.com/anthropics/skills
    43→
    44→### Vercel公式スキル
    45→
    46→- `find-skills` - スキル検索・発見支援
    47→
    48→その他のVercelスキルは`nix/modules/home/agent-skills.nix`で追加可能です。
    49→利用可能なスキル一覧: https://github.com/vercel-labs/skills
    50→
    51→### Obsidianスキル
    52→
    53→- `obsidian-markdown` - Obsidian Flavored Markdown の作成・編集
    54→- `obsidian-bases` - Obsidian Bases（`.base`ファイル）の操作
    55→- `json-canvas` - JSON Canvas（`.canvas`ファイル）の操作
    56→- `obsidian-cli` - Obsidian CLI によるVault操作・プラグイン開発
    57→- `defuddle` - WebページからクリーンなMarkdownを抽出
    58→
    59→利用可能なスキル一覧: https://github.com/kepano/obsidian-skills
    60→
    61→### コミュニティスキル
    62→
    63→- `ui-ux-pro-max` - UI/UXデザインシステム生成（nextlevelbuilder）
    64→

content.text:
Perfect! Now I have all the information needed. Let me compile my findings:

## Summary of Search Results

### 1. **References Found**

#### "ashiba"
- **dotnix README.md** (line 122): References ashiba repository for project templates
  ```
  Project templates are managed in [ashiba](https://github.com/yutakobayashidev/ashiba).
  ```
- **Recent git commit**: `57da83d refactor: move templates to ashiba repository`

#### "template"
- **dotnix README.md** (line 120-122): Section titled "## Templates"
- **agents/skills/gha-lint/SKILL.md**: Contains reference to "template"

#### "flake init"
- **ashiba README.md** (line 8): Usage instructions
  ```bash
  nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>
  ```
- No direct references in dotnix repository

#### "nrn"
- **zsh/config/aliases.zsh** (line 45): Shell function definition
  ```bash
  nrn() { nix run "nixpkgs#$1" "${@:2}"; }
  ```

### 2. **Ashiba Repository Structure**

The ashiba repository exists at `/home/yuta/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/ashiba/` with the following directory structure:

```
ashiba/
├── .git/
├── .github/
├── .mailmap
├── flake.lock
├── flake.nix                      # Template flake configuration
├── template.nix                   # Template definitions
├── README.md                      # Usage documentation
├── renovate.json
├── flake-devenv/                  # Template 1: devenv setup
│   ├── .envrc
│   ├── .gitignore
│   └── flake.nix
├── next/                          # Template 2: Next.js with Tailwind & shadcn/ui
│   ├── .env.example
│   ├── .gitignore
│   ├── .prettierrc.json
│   ├── .vscode/
│   ├── components.json
│   ├── eslint.config.mjs
│   ├── next.config.ts
│   ├── package.json
│   ├── pnpm-lock.yaml
│   ├── postcss.config.js
│   ├── posts/
│   ├── src/
│   ├── tailwind.config.ts
│   ├── tsconfig.json
│   ├── vitest.config.ts
│   └── README.md
└── next-firebase-auth-e2e/       # Template 3: Next.js with Firebase & E2E tests
    ├── .env.example
    ├── .env.test
    ├── .gitignore
    ├── e2e/
    ├── eslint.config.mjs
    ├── firebase.json
    ├── next.config.ts
    ├── package.json
    ├── playwright.config.ts
    ├── pnpm-lock.yaml
    ├── postcss.config.mjs
    ├── public/
    ├── src/
    ├── tailwind.config.ts
    ├── tsconfig.json
    └── README.md
```

### 3. **Template Configuration in ashiba**

**flake.nix:**
```nix
{
  description = "Project templates collection";
  outputs = inputs@{ flake-parts, ... }:
    flake-parts.lib.mkFlake { inherit inputs; } {
      flake = {
        templates = import ./template.nix { inherit inputs; };
      };
    };
}
```

**template.nix:**
```nix
{
  flake-devenv = { path = ./flake-devenv; description = "Nix flake with devenv, treefmt, and git-hooks"; };
  next = { path = ./next; description = "Next.js with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui"; };
  next-firebase-auth-e2e = { path = ./next-firebase-auth-e2e; description = "Next.js App Router with Firebase Auth and E2E testing"; };
  web-app = { path = inputs.web-app-template; description = "Web app template by hiroppy"; };
}
```

### 4. **Git History**

**dotnix commits:**
- `57da83d`: `refactor: move templates to ashiba repository` (latest)
- `27c04ae`: `feat: add flake templates for project scaffolding`

**ashiba commits** (recent):
- `cf495d1`: `refactor: use flake-parts and split template.nix`
- `d9a0365`: `feat: add web-app template from hiroppy/web-app-template`
- `3d83c5c`: `feat: add flake templates (flake-devenv, next-firebase-auth-e2e)`

### 5. **Available Templates**

According to ashiba README.md:

| Name | Description |
|---|---|
| `flake-devenv` | Nix flake with devenv, treefmt, and git-hooks |
| `next` | Next.js with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui |
| `next-firebase-auth-e2e` | Next.js App Router with Firebase Auth and E2E testing |
| `web-app` | Web app template by hiroppy |

**Usage:** `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<template-name>`

### 6. **dotnix flake.nix**

No template configuration found in the dotnix flake.nix itself. Templates are now managed exclusively in the separate ashiba repository, as referenced in the README documentation.

  flake-devenv = { path = ./flake-devenv; description = "Nix flake with devenv, treefmt, and git-hooks"; };
  next = { path = ./next; description = "Next.js with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui"; };
  next-firebase-auth-e2e = { path = ./next-firebase-auth-e2e; description = "Next.js App Router with Firebase Auth and E2E testing"; };
  web-app = { path = inputs.web-app-template; description = "Web app template by hiroppy"; };
}
```

### 4. **Git History**

**dotnix commits:**
- `57da83d`: `refactor: move templates to ashiba repository` (latest)
- `27c04ae`: `feat: add flake templates for project scaffolding`

**ashiba commits** (recent):
- `cf495d1`: `refactor: use flake-parts and split template.nix`
- `d9a0365`: `feat: add web-app template from hiroppy/web-app-template`
- `3d83c5c`: `feat: add flake templates (flake-devenv, next-firebase-auth-e2e)`

### 5. **Available Templates**

According to ashiba README.md:

| Name | Description |
|---|---|
| `flake-devenv` | Nix flake with devenv, treefmt, and git-hooks |
| `next` | Next.js with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui |
| `next-firebase-auth-e2e` | Next.js App Router with Firebase Auth and E2E testing |
| `web-app` | Web app template by hiroppy |

**Usage:** `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<template-name>`

### 6. **dotnix flake.nix**

No template configuration found in the dotnix flake.nix itself. Templates are now managed exclusively in the separate ashiba repository, as referenced in the README documentation.

content.thinking:
Now I understand the situation. The user already has:
1. An ashiba repo with flake templates that works with `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>`
2. A `nrn` function in their zsh config: `nrn() { nix run "nixpkgs#$1" "${@:2}"; }`

They want a similar shorthand command `ashiba` that wraps `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>` - similar to how `nrn` is a shorthand for `nix run "nixpkgs#$1"`.


I should look at their aliases file to see where this function would fit best.

file.content:
#!/usr/bin/env zsh

# ========================================
# Aliases
# ========================================

# rebuild - unified via flake apps
alias rebuild="nix run ~/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix#switch && source ~/.zshrc"

# Platform-specific aliases
if [[ "$(uname)" == "Darwin" ]]; then
  alias cpd="pwd | pbcopy"
else
  alias cpd="pwd | wl-copy"
fi

# AI tools
alias cl="claude"
alias cld="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions"
alias cldc="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --continue"
alias clh="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model haiku"
alias clo="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model opus"
alias cls="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model sonnet"
alias oc="opencode"
alias cx="codex"
alias ca="cursor-agent"

# Docker
alias do="docker container"
alias dop="docker container ps"
alias dob="docker container build"
alias dor="docker container run --rm"
alias dox="docker container exec -it"

# Docker Compose
alias dc="docker compose"
alias dcu="docker compose up"
alias dcub="docker compose up --build"
alias dcd="docker compose down"
alias dcr="docker compose restart"

# Nix
alias ns="nix-shell"
alias ngc="nix-collect-garbage"
nrn() { nix run "nixpkgs#$1" "${@:2}"; }

alias p="pnpm"
alias ls="lsd -1A"
alias ll="lsd -l"
alias la="lsd -la"
alias lt="lsd --tree"
alias cat="bat"
alias gg="ghq get"
alias prw="gh pr view --web"
alias gundo="git reset --soft HEAD~1"
alias rmswap="find . -type f -name \"*.swp\" -delete && find . -type f -name \".*.swp\" -delete"

content.text: `nrn` と同じパターンで `ashiba` 関数を追加します。

input.new_string:
nrn() { nix run "nixpkgs#$1" "${@:2}"; }
ashiba() { nix flake init -t "github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#$1"; }

toolUseResult.newString:

ashiba() { nix flake init -t "github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#$1"; }
toolUseResult.originalFile:
#!/usr/bin/env zsh

# ========================================
# Aliases
# ========================================

# rebuild - unified via flake apps
alias rebuild="nix run ~/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix#switch && source ~/.zshrc"

# Platform-specific aliases
if [[ "$(uname)" == "Darwin" ]]; then
  alias cpd="pwd | pbcopy"
else
  alias cpd="pwd | wl-copy"
fi

# AI tools
alias cl="claude"
alias cld="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions"
alias cldc="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --continue"
alias clh="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model haiku"
alias clo="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model opus"
alias cls="claude --dangerously-skip-permissions --model sonnet"
alias oc="opencode"
alias cx="codex"
alias ca="cursor-agent"

# Docker
alias do="docker container"
alias dop="docker container ps"
alias dob="docker container build"
alias dor="docker container run --rm"
alias dox="docker container exec -it"

# Docker Compose
alias dc="docker compose"
alias dcu="docker compose up"
alias dcub="docker compose up --build"
alias dcd="docker compose down"
alias dcr="docker compose restart"

# Nix
alias ns="nix-shell"
alias ngc="nix-collect-garbage"
nrn() { nix run "nixpkgs#$1" "${@:2}"; }

alias p="pnpm"
alias ls="lsd -1A"
alias ll="lsd -l"
alias la="lsd -la"
alias lt="lsd --tree"
alias cat="bat"
alias gg="ghq get"
alias prw="gh pr view --web"
alias gundo="git reset --soft HEAD~1"
alias rmswap="find . -type f -name \"*.swp\" -delete && find . -type f -name \".*.swp\" -delete"

content.text:
これで `ashiba <name>` と打つだけで `nix flake init -t github:yutakobayashidev/ashiba#<name>` が実行されます。

使い方:
```bash
ashiba next              # Next.js テンプレート
ashiba flake-devenv      # devenv テンプレート
ashiba next-firebase-auth-e2e  # Firebase Auth + E2E テンプレート
ashiba web-app           # hiroppy/web-app-template
```

反映するには `source ~/.zshrc` するか、新しいシェルを開いてください。
